c:attribute.name: wifiEnabled
c:attribute.description: When true, wireless interface is enabled.

c:attribute.name: wifiState
c:attribute.description: Indicates whether or not this device has a WiFi connection to an access point.

c:attribute.name: wifiSsid
c:attribute.description: SSID of base station connected to.

c:attribute.name: wifiBssid
c:attribute.description: BSSID of base station connected to.

c:attribute.name: wifiRssi
c:attribute.description: Received signal stength indicator in dB.

c:method.name: WiFiConnect
c:method.description: Attempts to connect to the access point with the given properties.

c:parameter.name: ssid
c:parameter.description: SSID of base station connected to.

c:parameter.name: bssid
c:parameter.description: BSSID of base station connected to.

c:return.name: status
c:return.description: A status indicating status of the wireless connect

c:return.name: message
c:return.description: An informative message about the status

c:method.name: WiFiDisconnect
c:method.description: Disconnects from current access point. USE WITH CAUTION.

c:return.name: status
c:return.description: A status indicating status of the wireless connect

c:return.name: message
c:return.description: An informative message about the status

c:method.name: WiFiStartScan
c:method.description: Starts a wifi scan that will end after timeout seconds unless endWifiScan() is called. Periodically, while WiFi scan is active, WiFiScanResults events will be generated.

c:parameter.name: timeout
c:parameter.description: The number of seconds to scan unless endWifiScan() is called.

c:method.name: WiFiEndScan
c:method.description: Ends any active WiFiScan. If no scan is active, this is a no-op.

c:event.name: WiFiScanResults
c:event.description: Drivers should return a complete list of all BSSIDs found during the lifetime of the scan, not just those BSSIDs which are newly observed at the time of event generation.

c:event.name: WiFiConnectResult
c:event.description: This event will be returned once testing of the wireless connect attempt completes or times out.

c:parameter.name: status
c:parameter.description: A status indicating status of the wireless connect attempt
